'''Regina Probationum''' is [[Rosaria]]'s [[1st Ascension Passive]].

==Trivia==
*The name comes from the real Latin phrase "confessio est regina probationum," (lit. confession is the queen of evidence) which was used to justify forced confessions via torture in Medieval Europe.
